ref_name.description: name of the reference, e.g., hg38

fastq_pairs.description: An array of objects each of which contains a 'read_group' (the name of the read group that produced the fastq pair), fastq_1' and 'fastq_2' which are URIs of the pair of fastq files and 'platform' e.g. 'illumina' or 'solid'.

ecr_registry.description: aws ecr registry of the account

aws_region.description: aws region (e.g. us-east-1). must match were source data is located and where workflow is executed
